name: Jo's Jungle Jamboree
description:
Aim: 

  • Clear all the stages and defeat the final boss!

Controls: 

  • WASD or Directional keys to move
  • Space-bar to jump
  • Jump on the enemy heads to deal damage

NOTE: The keyboard controls are buggy, the game runs much smoother on a controller (PS4, Xbox1, switch, some default gamepads).
